EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you for registering – webinar link inside
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Thank you for registering Hi {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}}, Thank you for registering for the webinar: {{my.EventName:default=edit me}}. You can watch the webinar using the link below.

Thank you, and enjoy the webinar!
